channel.title: Cloud SQL on GCP Support Sandboxes
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud SQL on GCP Support Sandboxes

item.title: With Load Test
item.description: Cloud SQL with Perfomance Test # Deploy with CloudShell Description # Cloud SQL with Load Test example List of the components used in this sandbox: VPC Network Cloud SQL K6 Example SQL Performance Test Setup # First you need initialize the sandbox configuration. To do this please run the initialization command: hub stack init The command will prompt you to enter the GCP project ID and will create initial configuration files and download required components.
